newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: RADIO HEADLINES AT NOON - MAY 26.
newsitem.headline: RADIO HEADLINES AT NOON - MAY 26.

text.p: These were the main news headlines reported by Lithuania's radio M1 Plus at noon on Monday. Reuters has not verified these reports and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- President Algirdas Brazauskas will participate in the summitt of the three Baltic presidents in Otepaa in Estonia on Monday to discuss integration into the European Union and NATO and regional co-operation issues. The three presidents will be joined by the presidents of Ukraine and Poland on Tuesday.
- The chairman of parliament Vytautas Landsbergis said he expected the interparliamentary assembley of Lithuania and Poland to start its work next month.
